Package corDetector

Class ShapeDetector

java.lang.Object
corDetector.ShapeDetector
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleDetector, PolygonDetector, SegmentDetector
public abstract class ShapeDetector
extends java.lang.Object
ShapeDetector is the abstract base class for all detector of shape which allow to recognize and process the different data that the client sends to the server. It's a repsonsability's chain.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ShapeDetector()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void detecter​(java.lang.String[] requete, Window W)
    The main function of the responsability's chain this method passes the request to each ShapeDetector until one of them has detected a shape, otherwise returns null If a shape is detected, create it with the specific information of the request and add it to the ShapesManager of the world.
    abstract boolean estDetectee​(java.lang.String[] requete)
    allows to know if the analysis of the request has led to the detection of a shape
    int indexOf​(java.lang.String[] data, java.lang.String val)
    Find the index of a specific string in an string array If the specific string isn't in the string array return -1.
    boolean isGrouped​(java.lang.String[] requete)
    Determine if a shape is grouped or not
    void setSuivant​(ShapeDetector d)
    Set the next ShapeDetector in the repsonsability's chain

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public ShapeDetector()

  • Method Details

    • setSuivant

      public void setSuivant​(ShapeDetector d)
      Set the next ShapeDetector in the repsonsability's chain
      Parameters:
      d - the next ShapeDetector of the responsability's chain

    • indexOf

      public int indexOf​(java.lang.String[] data, java.lang.String val)
      Find the index of a specific string in an string array If the specific string isn't in the string array return -1.
      Parameters:
      data - The string array
      val - The specific string you are looking for in the string array
      Returns:
      The index of val in data, or -1 if isn't present

    • isGrouped

      public boolean isGrouped​(java.lang.String[] requete)
      Determine if a shape is grouped or not
      Parameters:
      requete - the requete with information about the shape
      Returns:
      true if grouped, else false

    • estDetectee

      public abstract boolean estDetectee​(java.lang.String[] requete)
      allows to know if the analysis of the request has led to the detection of a shape
      Parameters:
      requete - the requete to analysis
      Returns:
      True if detected, else false

    • detecter

      public void detecter​(java.lang.String[] requete, Window W)
      The main function of the responsability's chain this method passes the request to each ShapeDetector until one of them has detected a shape, otherwise returns null If a shape is detected, create it with the specific information of the request and add it to the ShapesManager of the world.
      Parameters:
      requete - the requete to be analyzed and deserialize in a shape
      W - The window which contains the world in which we will add the shape
      See Also:
      deserialize(java.lang.String[]), Window, World
